auth.email_or_phone_note: You can enter either email or phone
auth.login_after_register_error: Could not log in after registration

home.hero_subtitle: We scan Telegram channels with vacancies to show you only what really fits. No spam. No endless searching.
home.step1_desc: Sign up to access personalized job recommendations and save your preferences.
home.step2_desc: Upload your CV and let our AI extract all the important information automatically.
home.step3_desc: Fine-tune your profile with additional skills, experience, and preferences.
home.step4_desc: Receive AI-powered job recommendations tailored specifically to your profile.
home.work_step1_desc: Continuously monitoring the best job channels for new opportunities
home.work_step2_title: Filter by your interests and experience
home.work_step2_desc: AI matches jobs based on your skills, location, and preferences
home.work_step3_title: Show only the most relevant vacancies
home.work_step3_desc: Get personalized job recommendations that actually fit your profile
home.feature1_desc: No more scrolling through irrelevant job posts. We filter everything for you.
home.feature2_desc: Smart profile filling, contact extraction, and job matching powered by AI.
home.feature3_desc: Get job updates even when you're not online. We work 24/7 for you.
home.browse_alternative_desc: Not ready to sign up? You can still browse all available vacancies without creating an account.

upload.title: Upload Resume
upload.onboarding_message: Now we are going to get information about you. Please upload your CV.
upload.drag_drop: Drag and drop your PDF file here, or click to browse
upload.success_onboarding: Great! Your resume has been processed.
upload.success_button: Let's check your profile and improve it to get better recommendations
upload.error_auth: User not authenticated. Please log in again.
upload.login_required: Please log in to upload your resume.

resume_library.title: Resume Library
resume_library.no_resumes: No resumes found. Create your first one!

profile.title: User Profile
profile.onboarding_message: The more information you provide, the better job recommendations you will receive.
profile.login_required: Please log in to view your profile.
profile.login_section: Log in to view and edit this section.

recommendations.title: Job Recommendations
recommendations.login_required: Please log in to view recommendations.
recommendations.no_profile: To get personalized recommendations, please fill out your Profile first. Start with basic information and job preferences: desired position, city, work format, schedule, industries and skills.
recommendations.incomplete_preferences: Great start! To get better recommendations, please fill out the Job Preferences section: desired position, city, work format, schedule, and industries.
recommendations.searching: Your profile looks great! We're actively searching for job recommendations that match your preferences. Check back soon or try refreshing.
